title: Container Agent Permissions and State Persistence

comment: CR-059 PRE-REVIEW: COMPLIANT. All verification items pass. FRONTMATTER: title = Container Agent Permissions and State Persistence (present, non-empty). revision_summary = Initial draft (acceptable for v0.1 per SOP-002 Section 8). STRUCTURE: All 12 required sections per SOP-002 Section 6 are present with substantive content. Sections 1-9 (pre-approved content) are complete. Sections 10-12 (execution-phase content) contain appropriate structural placeholders for execution. PLACEHOLDER CHECK: No TBD, TODO, FIXME, or XXX found. Execution table placeholders are in execution-phase sections, expected to be incomplete at pre-review. TRACEABILITY: References CR-056 (valid, CLOSED), SOP-001, SOP-002, SOP-004. FORMATTING: Consistent markdown throughout. Tables properly formatted. Section numbering sequential. TYPOS/ERRORS: None found. TECHNICAL ASSESSMENT: Purpose clear, scope well-bounded (two infrastructure files), allow/deny list design sound, risk assessment well-reasoned. REVIEW TEAM: No TU assignment required - Docker infrastructure only. Recommend for pre-approval.

CR-059 POST-REVIEW: COMPLIANT. All SOP-002 Section 7.3 post-review criteria verified with evidence.

(1) EXECUTION ITEMS: All 8 EIs show Pass outcome. No Fail outcomes, no VARs required.

(2) BLOCKING VARs: None exist. N/A.

(3) DOCUMENTATION: No controlled documents affected per Section 7.2. N/A.

(4) EVIDENCE: All EI rows contain substantive execution summaries. Three Execution Comments document EI-5 findings and EI-7 Docker rebuild issue. Section 11 Execution Summary provides complete narrative.

(5) SDLC PREREQUISITES: Not applicable (Docker infrastructure, not SDLC-governed code).

IMPLEMENTATION VERIFICATION: Inspected both modified files against approved spec.
- docker/.claude-settings.json: permissions block with 54 allow rules and 4 deny rules confirmed. All categories from Section 5.1 present (shell, Python, git, gh, jq, tmux, QMS MCP 17 tools, git MCP, WebSearch, WebFetch, Update). Deny rules block Edit/Write to QMS paths. enabledMcpjsonServers retained.
- docker/entrypoint.sh: projects/ and history.jsonl wipes removed. All retained cleanup confirmed (cache, session-env, debug, telemetry, backups, update lock, jq MCP cleaning). Comments updated with CR-059 reference.

COMMIT VERIFIED: EI-8 references 95980f2, confirmed in git log.

PRE-APPROVED SECTIONS: Sections 1-9 unchanged from pre-approval.

EI-5 PATTERN GAPS: Three Bash patterns (diff, pip show, git -C) still prompted. Documented with root cause. Core functionality achieved (16/19 commands prompt-free). No VAR required - implementation matches spec; gaps are platform-level pattern matching behavior.

Recommend for post-approval.
